instructions: Tap For You, then tap the My Account button . Tap Start Sharing with Friends. Friends can now follow you.
Tap For You, then tap the My Account button or your profile picture. Tap View Profile at the top of the screen.
Tap For You, then tap the My Account button or your profile picture. Tap View Profile. Tap Follow Requests, then accept or decline the requests.
Tap For You, then tap the My Account button or your profile picture. Tap View Profile. Tap Edit, then turn playlists on or off. Drag the reorder button to reorder them.
Tap For You, then tap the My Account button or your profile picture. Tap View Profile. Touch and hold the playlist or album (below Listening To). Tap Hide from Profile.
Tap For You, then tap the My Account button or your profile picture. Tap View Profile. Tap the More button , tap Share Profile, then choose a sharing option.
